mapper.insert: insert into event_todo_list (event_id, event_type, event_owner, event_date, snapshot) values (#{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{snapshot,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select event_id, event_type, event_owner, event_date, snapshot from event_todo_list
